content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #86831 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
@apiraino IIRC t-libs-api now triages their regressions, right? I'm wondering if we don't have to do it here anymore.
yes @Yuki Okushi I think you're right, we can now probably ignore prioritizing them (I'll remove all T-libs stuff anyway from the agenda starting next week)

you also make me think about whether to remove the notifications at all when an issue is labelled with I-prioritize (by adding T-libs to the exclude_labels here). Or maybe redirect the notification to another zulip stream. I'll check with T-libs
